Mu Guardian.description: Mu Guardians pulse with the blood of their slaughtered ancestors in their veins. They have read unholy tomes, visited other planes of existence, and performed dark sacrifices too terrible to mention to become masters of the mystic arts.

Mu Mystic.description: This Mu Mystic must conserve his power in order to complete a spell. For now, he is insensate to the outside world while he maintains his internal mental focus.

Mu Striker.description: Strikers are descendents of the long-lost Mu, drafted into Arachnos service to fight both mystic heroes and the troublesome Circle of Thorns.

Mu Vault Door.description: This massive stone door seals off the Vaults of the Mu and the portal to the world beyond. It's covered in spells and wards placed on it long ago by the peoples of Mu.

Mummified Chamber.description: Their hatred for humanity and utter disdain for life have left the Banished Pantheon with few allies. Thus they must make their own, by raising the dead to create armies of zombie-like servants totally devoted to their devilish agenda.

Mummified Husk.description: The Banished Pantheon's powers reach from the spirit world to raise the bodies of long dead soldiers armed with the weapons of our forefathers. These dried out Husks of men provide the backbone of the Pantheon's armies - a never ending supply of undead warriors.

Murk Eidolon.description: In Dr. Vahzilok's mind, the Eidolons are mankind's next great evolutionary leap. Unlike the cadavers, they retain all of their memories and personality. The lucky few who can pay to become a Eidolon are augmented with the remains of heroes, so they often have super powers. Murk Eidolons, like the Mire Eidolons, have mastered the ability to control darkness. They tend to immobilize their opponents, then drain their life.

Mutate Brawler.description: After a few months in the service of the Lost, members begin to mutate, becoming distorted, grotesque looking men. Although they still use the same weapons as the Scroungers, their mutations give them increased strength and resilience, making them much more dangerous.

Mutate Buckshot.description: After a few months in the service of the Lost, members begin to mutate, becoming distorted, grotesque looking men. Although they still use the same weapons as the Scroungers, their mutations give them increased strength and resilience, making them much more dangerous.

Mutate Chopper.description: After a few months in the service of the Lost, members begin to mutate, becoming distorted, grotesque looking men. Although they still use the same weapons as the Scroungers, their mutations give them increased strength and resilience, making them much more dangerous.

Mutate Gunner.description: After a few months in the service of the Lost, members begin to mutate, becoming distorted, grotesque looking men. Although they still use the same weapons as the Scroungers, their mutations give them increased strength and resilience, making them much more dangerous.

Mutate Quantum Gunner.description: After a few months in the service of the Lost, members begin to mutate, becoming distorted, grotesque looking men. Although they still use the same weapons as the Scroungers, their mutations give them increased strength and resilience, making them much more dangerous.

Mutate Slammer.description: After a few months in the service of the Lost, members begin to mutate, becoming distorted, grotesque looking men. Although they still use the same weapons as the Scroungers, their mutations give them increased strength and resilience, making them much more dangerous.

Mutate Slicer.description: After a few months in the service of the Lost, members begin to mutate, becoming distorted, grotesque looking men. Although they still use the same weapons as the Scroungers, their mutations give them increased strength and resilience, making them much more dangerous.

Mutate Slugger.description: After a few months in the service of the Lost, members begin to mutate, becoming distorted, grotesque looking men. Although they still use the same weapons as the Scroungers, their mutations give them increased strength and resilience, making them much more dangerous.

Mynx.description: Katherine Stevens was a young college student who was transformed against her will by cruel Crey experimentation. After escaping from Crey, she was discovered on the streets by Synapse of the Freedom Phalanx, who helped her regain control and recover her memory. Now she uses her superhuman reflexes and implanted battle claws to hunt crime in the urban jungle of Paragon City.

Mystic Advisor.description: The advice of spirits from other realms is useful. Their guidance gives you more control for your base.

Mystic Anchorite.description: The Mystic Anchorites are well-trained in the mystical arts and serve as commanders in the Carnival of Light. Many of them can trace their origins back to the Midnight Squad of Praetoria, but others have been derived from the followers of Vanessa DeVore. It is under their tutelage that novitiates can gain strength and help the organization at large.

Mystic Lantern.description: This is a hard light hologram of a Mystic Lantern.

Mystic Orrery.description: This device monitors the motions of the planets and stars, allowing it to choose the most auspicious moments for weaving powerful control spells. These spells are necessary to bind the energies of all security devices in your base and keep them functioning properly.

Mystic Overseer.description: Through the Overseer, you can call upon many spirits. Their guidance gives you more control for your base.

Mystical Bookshelf.description: Information is key to defeating your enemies. These magical texts generate additional control for your defenses.

Mystical Cauldron.description: An ancient cauldron that Arachnos stole from the Circle of Thorns. Inside, a bubbling mass of the tainted water from the Well of the Furies.

Nacht Elite Fire.description: The Nacht Elites are world-class special forces operatives, as well trained as any Navy SEAL. They're expert insurgents, capable of infiltrating a target swiftly and silently, then taking it down. Elites undergo a basic super soldier regimen designed to heighten their stealth, accuracy, and concentration. These enhancements make them incredibly dangerous, especially when encountered in force.

Nacht Elite Fist.description: The Nacht Elites are world-class special forces operatives, as well trained as any Navy SEAL. They're expert insurgents, capable of infiltrating a target swiftly and silently, then taking it down. Elites undergo a basic super soldier regimen designed to heighten their stealth, accuracy, and concentration. These enhancements make them incredibly dangerous, especially when encountered in force.

Nacht Elite Force.description: The Nacht Elites are world-class special forces operatives, as well trained as any Navy SEAL. They're expert insurgents, capable of infiltrating a target swiftly and silently, then taking it down. Elites undergo a basic super soldier regimen designed to heighten their stealth, accuracy, and concentration. These enhancements make them incredibly dangerous, especially when encountered in force.

Nacht Elite Grenade.description: The Nacht Elites are world-class special forces operatives, as well trained as any Navy SEAL. They're expert insurgents, capable of infiltrating a target swiftly and silently, then taking it down. Elites undergo a basic super soldier regimen designed to heighten their stealth, accuracy, and concentration. These enhancements make them incredibly dangerous, especially when encountered in force.

Nacht Elite Oberst.description: While most Elites concentrate on learning the basic skills required for special ops, the Obersts receive additional training in tactics. They're also trained in technological skills, such as wire tapping and circumventing security systems. Combined with their prodigious super soldier enhancements, these skills make Elite Obersts well-prepared to plan and carry out small covert ops.

Nacht Elite Rifle.description: The Nacht Elites are world-class special forces operatives, as well trained as any Navy SEAL. They're expert insurgents, capable of infiltrating a target swiftly and silently, then taking it down. Elites undergo a basic super soldier regimen designed to heighten their stealth, accuracy, and concentration. These enhancements make them incredibly dangerous, especially when encountered in force.

Nacht Elite Rocket.description: The Nacht Elites are world-class special forces operatives, as well trained as any Navy SEAL. They're expert insurgents, capable of infiltrating a target swiftly and silently, then taking it down. Elites undergo a basic super soldier regimen designed to heighten their stealth, accuracy, and concentration. These enhancements make them incredibly dangerous, especially when encountered in force.

Nacht Elite Sharpshooter.description: Those gifted with incredible accuracy are quickly transferred into the Nacht division, where they undergo lengthy treatments to refine their abilities. The Sharpshooters are natural loners and disdain associating with the rank and file. The only praise they seek is the satisfaction of a silent kill.

Nacht Elite Unteroffizier.description: A Nacht Elite at the peak of his game may earn the rank of Unteroffizier, and with it a large upgrade in super soldier serum. He is on the verge of Ubermensch status, and his mind has become focused with laser-like intensity. High ranking Elites are some of the best shots and most dedicated insurgents in the world. They can, and have, assassinated heads of state as well as world famous heroes.

Nacht Fire.description: The Nacht is the 5th Column's special operations division, tasked with covert ops, assassinations, and espionage. Even the lowest level recruits receive some special training, particularly in stealth and evasion techniques. New recruits must have some military or law enforcement experience before being accepted into the Nacht.

Nacht Fist.description: The Nacht is the 5th Column's special operations division, tasked with covert ops, assassinations, and espionage. Even the lowest level recruits receive some special training, particularly in stealth and evasion techniques. New recruits must have some military or law enforcement experience before being accepted into the Nacht.

Nacht Force.description: The Nacht is the 5th Column's special operations division, tasked with covert ops, assassinations, and espionage. Even the lowest level recruits receive some special training, particularly in stealth and evasion techniques. New recruits must have some military or law enforcement experience before being accepted into the Nacht.

Nacht Grenade.description: The Nacht is the 5th Column's special operations division, tasked with covert ops, assassinations, and espionage. Even the lowest level recruits receive some special training, particularly in stealth and evasion techniques. New recruits must have some military or law enforcement experience before being accepted into the Nacht.

Nacht Oberst.description: A Nacht Oberst is responsible for overseeing squads of covert operatives. Since coverts ops need to be precise and perfectly executed, a Nacht Oberst is valued chiefly for his ability to follow orders precisely and make sure his troops do the same. In return for loyalty and good service, Obersts receive their first taste of super soldier serum, making them stronger and quicker than any normal human could be.

Nacht Rifle.description: The Nacht is the 5th Column's special operations division, tasked with covert ops, assassinations, and espionage. Even the lowest level recruits receive some special training, particularly in stealth and evasion techniques. New recruits must have some military or law enforcement experience before being accepted into the Nacht.

Nacht Rocket.description: The Nacht is the 5th Column's special operations division, tasked with covert ops, assassinations, and espionage. Even the lowest level recruits receive some special training, particularly in stealth and evasion techniques. New recruits must have some military or law enforcement experience before being accepted into the Nacht.

Nacht Ubermenschen Fire.description: The Ubermenschen of the Nacht have transcended mere special ops status. They are each unto themselves a powerful covert force, capable of taking on operations that would normally require an entire team of commandos. In addition to their enhanced physical and mental attributes, they receive training in security systems, computer infiltration, and surveillance equipment. In many ways, they are the perfect spies.

Nacht Ubermenschen Fist.description: The Ubermenschen of the Nacht have transcended mere special ops status. They are each unto themselves a powerful covert force, capable of taking on operations that would normally require an entire team of commandos. In addition to their enhanced physical and mental attributes, they receive training in security systems, computer infiltration, and surveillance equipment. In many ways, they are the perfect spies.

Nacht Ubermenschen Force.description: The Ubermenschen of the Nacht have transcended mere special ops status. They are each unto themselves a powerful covert force, capable of taking on operations that would normally require an entire team of commandos. In addition to their enhanced physical and mental attributes, they receive training in security systems, computer infiltration, and surveillance equipment. In many ways, they are the perfect spies.

Nacht Ubermenschen Grenade.description: The Ubermenschen of the Nacht have transcended mere special ops status. They are each unto themselves a powerful covert force, capable of taking on operations that would normally require an entire team of commandos. In addition to their enhanced physical and mental attributes, they receive training in security systems, computer infiltration, and surveillance equipment. In many ways, they are the perfect spies.

Nacht Ubermenschen Oberst.description: The Nacht Ubermenschen Obersts author their own plans to sow terror and fear across Paragon City. Many are in command of small military cells, completely cut off from their compatriots - both for the sake of security, and to encourage independent thinking.

Nacht Ubermenschen Rifle.description: The Ubermenschen of the Nacht have transcended mere special ops status. They are each unto themselves a powerful covert force, capable of taking on operations that would normally require an entire team of commandos. In addition to their enhanced physical and mental attributes, they receive training in security systems, computer infiltration, and surveillance equipment. In many ways, they are the perfect spies.

Nacht Ubermenschen Rocket.description: The Ubermenschen of the Nacht have transcended mere special ops status. They are each unto themselves a powerful covert force, capable of taking on operations that would normally require an entire team of commandos. In addition to their enhanced physical and mental attributes, they receive training in security systems, computer infiltration, and surveillance equipment. In many ways, they are the perfect spies.

Nacht Ubermenschen Unteroffizier.description: Unlike their counterparts in the other branches of the 5th Column hierarchy, the Nacht Ubermenschen Unteroffizier have considerable autonomy. The 5th Column feels that the subversive activities that fall within the Nacht's purview require a certain amount of independence. This makes the Nacht Ubermenschen quite unpredictable at times - and thus, quite deadly.

Nacht Unteroffizier.description: The Nacht Unteroffizier have completed their covert ops training and are on the verge of being promoted to Elite status. They have yet to benefit from a course of super soldier serum, but they have honed their stealth and physique to a near perfect level. Unteroffizier are often tasked with leading squads of Nacht soldiers on raids to raise funds for the 5th Column.

Nadia.description: Mistress Nadia, a powerful sorcerer of the Carnival of Light, watches over the Survivor Compound, striving to keep it safe from the myriad dangers of First Ward.

Nails.description: In some jailbreaks, the toughest of the prisoners manage to overpower the Zig's security guards and grab their weapons.

Nancy.description: This civilian has been invited to hang out in your Supergroup Base.

Natterling.description: Natterlings travel in large packs, hopping about the floating islands and mystic causeways of the Shadow Shard looking for intruders. They're very good scavengers, and any piece of technology or any living thing they find they'll scoop up and bring back to their masters.

Nebel Elite Fire.description: Once a soldier has proven his total commitment to the cause, he is transferred into the ranks of the Elite. Only one in five soldiers survive long enough to achieve this promotion. Nebel Elites receive first stage super soldier serum that improves their physical prowess to the level of Olympic athletes. They also go through training courses before being put back into the battle lines. After all, the 5th Column has made an investment in their success.

Nebel Elite Fist.description: Once a soldier has proven his total commitment to the cause, he is transferred into the ranks of the Elite. Only one in five soldiers survive long enough to achieve this promotion. Nebel Elites receive first stage super soldier serum that improves their physical prowess to the level of Olympic athletes. They also go through training courses before being put back into the battle lines. After all, the 5th Column has made an investment in their success.

Nebel Elite Force.description: Once a soldier has proven his total commitment to the cause, he is transferred into the ranks of the Elite. Only one in five soldiers survive long enough to achieve this promotion. Nebel Elites receive first stage super soldier serum that improves their physical prowess to the level of Olympic athletes. They also go through training courses before being put back into the battle lines. After all, the 5th Column has made an investment in their success.

Nebel Elite Grenade.description: Once a soldier has proven his total commitment to the cause, he is transferred into the ranks of the Elite. Only one in five soldiers survive long enough to achieve this promotion. Nebel Elites receive first stage super soldier serum that improves their physical prowess to the level of Olympic athletes. They also go through training courses before being put back into the battle lines. After all, the 5th Column has made an investment in their success.

Nebel Elite Oberst.description: The leaders of the Nebel Elite are near perfect soldierly specimens. In addition to the normal super soldier serum, they receive a special formula that enhances intellect and problem solving skills. An Elite Oberst is utterly devoted to the 5th Column's cause, and he can finally be trusted to lead his soldiers without direction from above.

Nebel Elite Rifle.description: Once a soldier has proven his total commitment to the cause, he is transferred into the ranks of the Elite. Only one in five soldiers survive long enough to achieve this promotion. Nebel Elites receive first stage super soldier serum that improves their physical prowess to the level of Olympic athletes. They also go through training courses before being put back into the battle lines. After all, the 5th Column has made an investment in their success.

Nebel Elite Rocket.description: Once a soldier has proven his total commitment to the cause, he is transferred into the ranks of the Elite. Only one in five soldiers survive long enough to achieve this promotion. Nebel Elites receive first stage super soldier serum that improves their physical prowess to the level of Olympic athletes. They also go through training courses before being put back into the battle lines. After all, the 5th Column has made an investment in their success.

Nebel Elite Unteroffizier.description: A high-ranking Nebel Elite Unteroffizier is a force to be reckoned with. His increased physical prowess is now matched by improved tactical skills and the steely resolve of a combat veteran. The super soldier serum and attendant propaganda have left the soldier utterly devoted to the 5th Column's cause. He is willing to follow any order, and he seldom worries about the messy consequences.

Nebel Fire.description: It doesn't take much training or expertise to join the 5th Column. Members who have neither receive basic weapons and are immediately put into service in the ranks of the Nebel, the 5th Column's front-line ranks. After all, the 5th Column believes in survival of the fittest.

Nebel Fist.description: As far as the 5th Column's concerned, the best way to prove one's worthiness is to survive and blossom in the crucible of combat. The 5th Column Martial Artists are good at doing just that. They are the best soldiers in their squads, and they're not above pointing this out to their comrades.

Nebel Force.description: It doesn't take much training or expertise to join the 5th Column. Members who have neither receive basic weapons and are immediately put into service in the ranks of the Nebel, the 5th Column's front-line ranks. After all, the 5th Column believes in survival of the fittest.

Nebel Grenade.description: It doesn't take much training or expertise to join the 5th Column. Members who have neither receive basic weapons and are immediately put into service in the ranks of the Nebel, the 5th Column's front-line ranks. After all, the 5th Column believes in survival of the fittest.

Nebel Oberst.description: To be commissioned an Oberst, or Colonel, a Nebel soldier must prove himself over the course of many battles. Many of them resent having to continue working with raw recruits, but this indignity is more than compensated for by their first taste of super soldier serums and body enhancements. Combined with their combat experience, these enhancements make them formidable foes.

Nebel Praktikant.description: It doesn't take much training or expertise to join the 5th Column. Members who have neither receive basic weapons and are immediately put into service in the ranks of the Nebel, the 5th Column's front-line ranks. After all, the 5th Column believes in survival of the fittest.

Nebel Rifle.description: It doesn't take much training or expertise to join the 5th Column. Members who have neither receive basic weapons and are immediately put into service in the ranks of the Nebel, the 5th Column's front-line ranks. After all, the 5th Column believes in survival of the fittest.

Nebel Rocket.description: It doesn't take much training or expertise to join the 5th Column. Members who have neither receive basic weapons and are immediately put into service in the ranks of the Nebel, the 5th Column's front-line ranks. After all, the 5th Column believes in survival of the fittest.

Nebel Ubermenschen Fire.description: An Ubermensch, or 'Over Man' is a 5th Column soldier who has undergone a long and painful regimen of super soldier treatments. The Nebel Ubermenschen are the most numerous of these medical marvels, but that doesn't mean they're common. They've had extensive training and thousands of dollars worth of drugs pumped into them. It's an investment that usually pays off, since a first rank Ubermensch is stronger than five normal men.

Nebel Ubermenschen Fist.description: An Ubermensch, or 'Over Man' is a 5th Column soldier who has undergone a long and painful regimen of super soldier treatments. The Nebel Ubermenschen are the most numerous of these medical marvels, but that doesn't mean they're common. They've had extensive training and thousands of dollars worth of drugs pumped into them. It's an investment that usually pays off, since a first rank Ubermensch is stronger than five normal men.

Nebel Ubermenschen Force.description: An Ubermensch, or 'Over Man' is a 5th Column soldier who has undergone a long and painful regimen of super soldier treatments. The Nebel Ubermenschen are the most numerous of these medical marvels, but that doesn't mean they're common. They've had extensive training and thousands of dollars worth of drugs pumped into them. It's an investment that usually pays off, since a first rank Ubermensch is stronger than five normal men.

Nebel Ubermenschen Grenade.description: An Ubermensch, or 'Over Man' is a 5th Column soldier who has undergone a long and painful regimen of super soldier treatments. The Nebel Ubermenschen are the most numerous of these medical marvels, but that doesn't mean they're common. They've had extensive training and thousands of dollars worth of drugs pumped into them. It's an investment that usually pays off, since a first rank Ubermensch is stronger than five normal men.

Nebel Ubermenschen Oberst.description: The highest ranking soldiers among the Nebel, the Nebel Ubermenschen Obersts are strikingly capable field officers, able to formulate and execute grand military campaigns. Unlike most modern officers, these Ubermenschen are not afraid to personally lead their soldiers into battle. After all, their own abilities far surpass those of all normal men and many super-powered heroes.

Nebel Ubermenschen Rifle.description: An Ubermensch, or 'Over Man' is a 5th Column soldier who has undergone a long and painful regimen of super soldier treatments. The Nebel Ubermenschen are the most numerous of these medical marvels, but that doesn't mean they're common. They've had extensive training and thousands of dollars worth of drugs pumped into them. It's an investment that usually pays off, since a first rank Ubermensch is stronger than five normal men.

Nebel Ubermenschen Rocket.description: An Ubermensch, or 'Over Man' is a 5th Column soldier who has undergone a long and painful regimen of super soldier treatments. The Nebel Ubermenschen are the most numerous of these medical marvels, but that doesn't mean they're common. They've had extensive training and thousands of dollars worth of drugs pumped into them. It's an investment that usually pays off, since a first rank Ubermensch is stronger than five normal men.

Nebel Ubermenschen Unteroffizier.description: The pinnacle of frontline soldiers, the Ubermenschen Unteroffizier are nearly unstoppable fighting machines. It often takes an anti-tank weapon just to faze one of these juggernauts. Fortunately, their numbers are small, though the 5th Column keeps making more of them as their soldiers become more experienced.

Nebel Unteroffizier.description: Only those Nebel Soldiers who have proven both resilient and trustworthy achieve the rank of Unteroffizier, or 'underofficer.' Through their skill in combat and their dedication to the 5th Column's cause, they have begun to earn real respect from their masters. In return, they receive better equipment and training, and are trusted with some low level secrets.

Nebula Adjutant.description: Only those Nebula soldiers who have proven both resilient and trustworthy achieve the rank of Adjutant. Through their skill in combat and their dedication to the Council's cause, they have begun to earn real respect from their leaders. In return, they receive better equipment and training, and are trusted with some low level secrets.

Nebula Archon.description: To ascend to the rank of Archon, a Nebula soldier must prove himself over the course of many battles. Many of them resent having to continue working with raw recruits, but this indignity is more than compensated for by their first taste of super soldier serums and body enhancements. Combined with their combat experience, these enhancements make them formidable foes.

Nebula Buckshot.description: New Council recruits are placed in the ranks of the Nebula, the lowest of the organization's Outer Bands. There they will either prove themselves worthy to learn the secrets of the Council, or else they will die in combat. Either way, they serve the Council's purposes.

Nebula Cor Leonis Adjutant.description: The pinnacle of frontline soldiers, the Cor Leonis Adjutants are nearly unstoppable fighting machines. It often takes an anti-tank weapon just to faze one of these juggernauts. Fortunately, their numbers are small, though the Council keeps making more of them as their soldiers become more experienced.

Nebula Cor Leonis Archon.description: The highest ranking soldiers among the Nebula, the Nebula Cor Leonis Archons are strikingly capable field officers, able to formulate and execute grand military campaigns. Unlike most modern officers, these Cor Leonis are not afraid to personally lead their soldiers into battle. After all, their own abilities far surpass those of all normal men and many super-powered heroes.

Nebula Cor Leonis Assault.description: A Cor Leonis is a Council soldier who has undergone a long and painful regimen of super soldier treatments. The Nebula Cor Leonis are the most numerous of these medical marvels, but that doesn't mean they're common. They've had extensive training and thousands of dollars worth of drugs pumped into them. It's an investment that usually pays off, since a first rank Cor Leonis is stronger than five normal men.

Nebula Cor Leonis Fire.description: A Cor Leonis is a Council soldier who has undergone a long and painful regimen of super soldier treatments. The Nebula Cor Leonis are the most numerous of these medical marvels, but that doesn't mean they're common. They've had extensive training and thousands of dollars worth of drugs pumped into them. It's an investment that usually pays off, since a first rank Cor Leonis is stronger than five normal men.

Nebula Cor Leonis Marksman.description: A Cor Leonis is a Council soldier who has undergone a long and painful regimen of super soldier treatments. The Nebula Cor Leonis are the most numerous of these medical marvels, but that doesn't mean they're common. They've had extensive training and thousands of dollars worth of drugs pumped into them. It's an investment that usually pays off, since a first rank Cor Leonis is stronger than five normal men.

Nebula Elite Adjutant.description: A high-ranking Nebula Elite Adjutant is a force to be reckoned with. His increased physical prowess is now matched by improved tactical skills and the steely resolve of a combat veteran. Regular doses of super soldier serum has left him entirely devoted to the Council's cause. He is willing to follow any order, and he seldom worries about the messy consequences.

Nebula Elite Archon.description: The leaders of the Nebula Elite are near perfect soldierly specimens. In addition to the normal super soldier serum, they receive a special formula that enhances intellect and problem solving skills. An Elite Archon is utterly devoted to the Council's plans for world domination, and he can finally be trusted to lead his soldiers without direction from above.

Nebula Elite Assault.description: Once a soldier has proven his total commitment to the cause, he is transferred into the ranks of the Elite. Only one in five soldiers survive long enough to achieve this promotion. Nebula Elites receive first stage super soldier serum that improves their physical prowess to the level of Olympic athletes. They also go through training courses before being put back into the battle lines. After all, the Council has made an investment in their success.

Nebula Elite Buckshot.description: Once a soldier has proven his total commitment to the cause, he is transferred into the ranks of the Elite. Only one in five soldiers survive long enough to achieve this promotion. Nebula Elites receive first stage super soldier serum that improves their physical prowess to the level of Olympic athletes. They also go through training courses before being put back into the battle lines. After all, the Council has made an investment in their success.

Nebula Elite Gunner.description: Once a soldier has proven his total commitment to the cause, he is transferred into the ranks of the Elite. Only one in five soldiers survive long enough to achieve this promotion. Nebula Elites receive first stage super soldier serum that improves their physical prowess to the level of Olympic athletes. They also go through training courses before being put back into the battle lines. After all, the Council has made an investment in their success.

Nebula Elite Marksman.description: Once a soldier has proven his total commitment to the cause, he is transferred into the ranks of the Elite. Only one in five soldiers survive long enough to achieve this promotion. Nebula Elites receive first stage super soldier serum that improves their physical prowess to the level of Olympic athletes. They also go through training courses before being put back into the battle lines. After all, the Council has made an investment in their success.

Nebula Gunner.description: New Council recruits are placed in the ranks of the Nebula, the lowest of the organization's Outer Bands. There they will either prove themselves worthy to learn the secrets of the Council, or else they will die in combat. Either way, they serve the Council's purposes.

Nebula Pistol.description: New Council recruits are placed in the ranks of the Nebula, the lowest of the organization's Outer Bands. There they will either prove themselves worthy to learn the secrets of the Council, or else they will die in combat. Either way, they serve the Council's purposes.

Needles.description: In some jailbreaks, the toughest of the prisoners manage to overpower the Zig's security guards and grab their weapons.

Nega-Pendragon.description: Born of death, the knight known only as Pendragon is the single mightiest combatant within the legion of the Black Knights. No challenger has ever defeated him in single combat, and even the mighty Dread Templar whisper that some preternatural force guides Pendragon's every move. Is he destined only to be Lorn's most potent blunt instrument?  Or is his past grander and his future greater than any around him have predicted?

Nemesis.description: Nemesis has had over 100 years to perfect his armor and his combat skills. He is a formidable, and wily, opponent.

Nemesis Gas.description: This poisonous gas was once a part of Nemesis' plot to conquer America. Though his plan to poison several major cities was thwarted, he still keeps large quantities of the gas around to help tip battles in his favor.

Nemesis Mole Machine.description: These tunneling tanks bring Nemesis troops anywhere in the world, bypassing even the strongest of defenses and serving as mobile rally points for the Nemesis Army.

Nemesis?.description: No one alive has ever seen Nemesis' true face. He hides within his finely wrought armor, safe behind personal force fields and a variety of armaments. He has many such suits of armor, each of which is a robot in its own right, capable of acting - and killing - independently.

Neo-Shivan.description: These horrible things are an amalgamation of human corpses and some sort of weird sentient goo from beyond the stars. These Shivans seem to come from the newly crashed meteors in Galaxy City. Their appearance is clearly different from that of the Shivans in Bloody Bay, but whether or not that is due to where they landed is up for debate.

Neo-Shivan Destroyer.description: These horrible things are an amalgamation of human corpses and some sort of weird sentient goo from beyond the stars. These Shivans seem to come from the newly crashed meteors in Galaxy City. Their appearance is clearly different from that of the Shivans in Bloody Bay, but whether or not that is due to where they landed is up for debate.

Neo-Shivan Smasher.description: These horrible things are an amalgamation of human corpses and some sort of weird sentient goo from beyond the stars. These Shivans seem to come from the newly crashed meteors in Galaxy City. Their appearance is clearly different from that of the Shivans in Bloody Bay, but whether or not that is due to where they landed is up for debate.

Nerva Spectral Daemon.description: Where go the Circle of Thorns go the legions of Hell. These gibbering monstrosities seem to be waiting for...something.

Nerva Spectral Daemon Lord.description: Where go the Circle of Thorns go the legions of Hell. These gibbering monstrosities seem to be waiting for...something.

Nerva Spectral Demon Essence.description: This demonic essence has been conjured out of the mists of the Well of the Furies, a study of an enemy made substance and brought to heel.

Netherworld.description: This entity plays an effect for players who are within the Netherworld phase.

Network.description: Network started his 'career' as a bookkeeper for The Family, until a fateful day on which he came across a powerful 'information suit' while cataloging the contents of a 'recovered' cargo container. This suit tied his mind directly into information networks around the world, giving him the bandwidth to accumulate unmatched resources within the organization and make a real name for himself. Eventually, he came across information that made him look at his employers in a new light and reconsider his role with them. This discovery drove him to offer his services to Sgt. Schorr, the leader of the Hammers of Justice, an organization whose secrets he had already learned through the information acquired through his suit.

Neural Nullifier.description:
This is a localized psionic collapse that will mercilessly bombard those within with vivid hallucinations of their greatest fears.

This typically leaves the victim terrorized and without their Defenses nor with any Resistance to damage.

Neuron.description: Known as Praetor Berry, Praetor of Sciences, in Praetoria, Neuron is a genius who steals his best ideas from Anti-Matter, the Praetorian version of Positron. He and Praetor Duncan dupe Anti-Matter regularly to ensure that Neuron ends up with all the credit and none of the mistakes.

Neuron Clone.description: This clone of Praetor Berry is not very powerful, but easy to produce. It has a minor attention span defect.

Neutron Burst.description: Armageddon strikes you with a Neutron Burst!

Newt.description: Newt is a devoted follower of Planarian doctrine, and has been experimenting on himself to boost his regenerative capabilities. He probably would not appreciate being called 'Newt the Cute'.

Nexus 99.description: Nexus 99 is a scientist who developed a method of tapping into an alternate dimension power source and using it as a weapon. He's been imprisoned in the Zigursky prison on grand theft charges.

Nicola Franco.description: Nicola Franco is a mid-level enforcer for the Family. He's spent the majority of his 'working' years behind bars, a fact attributed to his general carelessness when dealing with local authorities and Heroes.

Nictus Essence.description: This energy entity was formed when the life force from a defeated foe was infused with Nictus Energy.

Nictus Predator.description: These free-floating Nictus have been drawn to Earth from somewhere else on planet, bridging the distance through a Shadow Crystal. They have not yet joined with or possessed a host, and normally could not survive on a planet's surface for long. However, the dark energies of the Shadow Crystal sustain them, allowing them to hunt for hosts on their own.

Night Haunt.description: Over the years, pirates and other sailors came to the isle and were slain by the ghosts of Port Oakes. Their souls are added to this ghastly crew, which continues to grow to this very day. Beware the Night Haunt's touch, for their spectral sabers can cut flesh as well as any physical blade.

Night Terror.description: These ghosts look vaguely like ethereal French soldiers in their dress, but most of this is obscured by their transparent nature. Their faces are wide-eyed, while their mouths cycle constantly through a litany of screams and curses. Their hands and arms are pale red, stained with the life-force of the hundreds they've slain.

Night Widow.description: Night Widows are trained in stealth, infiltration, disguise, and cold-blooded murder. Most of their victims never even see them coming.

Nightmare.description: The dead are restless and are walking the earth. They hunger for your flesh!

Nightmare Marker.description: This marker tells Malaise where he can spawn his Nightmares.

Nightmare of Malaise.description: On Praetorian Earth the villain Malaise was never counseled by Sister Psyche, instead he was one of the 'patients' at one of Mother Mayhem's facilities. With the ability to control his madness and inflict it on others, he quickly rose to a position as her favorite.

Nightstar.description: This android is the creation of Anti-Matter as a testament to his love for Dominatrix. Nightstar is patterned after her in the same way that Siege is patterned after Tyrant. Neuron considers it an inferior design but Anti-Matter knows that one day victory will be his.

Nightstar Watcher.description: This entity detects Nightstar around her start location for badge tracking.

Nightwolf.description: The nature of the Nightwolves remains a terrifying mystery. These monstrous, werewolf like creatures were once human beings, but they have since been warped beyond all recognition. Unlike the Vampyri, these beasts are not the result of any known super serum treatment. Many suspect that some kind of magic is involved in their transformation.

Nightwolf Champion.description: The Nightwolf Champion has lost all of his humanity to whatever force transformed him into a monstrous killing machine. Unlike the more sedate Nightwolf warriors, the Champions are in a wild state and can barely be controlled. They are berserkers, unwilling to obey any orders when their enemy is in sight. They are, however, nearly impossible to kill, which makes up for their disobedient nature.

Niles Worthington.description: Whatever his reasons, Niles Worthington has betrayed the Vendetti family to the Council, their most hated enemies. In return, the Vendettis have put quite a price on his head.

Nimble Dave.description: Even prisoners have their hierarchies. Some convicts rise to leadership positions because of their ruthlessness and ferocity.

Ninja Ray.description: In some jailbreaks, the toughest of the prisoners manage to overpower the Zig's security guards and grab their weapons.

No Mind.description: No Mind has devoted his entire life to the study of martial arts and the zen philosophy. Now that his skills are honed to perfection, he can act without thought and fight for balance in the universe.

Noble Brute.description: Despite their size and name, the Brutes are far from stupid. They are expert soldiers, who work well with each other or with the many other strange creatures that inhabit the Shadow Shard.

Noble Brute Essence.description: This Rularuu Essence has been conjured out of the mists of the Well of the Furies, a study of an enemy made substance and brought to heel.

Noble Savage.description: Distraught over his transformation into a cybernetic monstrosity, the Noble Savage has teamed up with Demetrios Vasilikos to help those whose lives were also ruined by Praetor Berry's experiments. He sees himself as the defender of the defenseless, the sheriff of First Ward, and the protector of both the Forlorn and Ghouls alike. He will not rest until justice has been done, and Praetor Berry pays for his crimes against humanity. But one thing at a time, for now he has to concentrate on keeping his people safe.

Nocturne.description: The Nightwidows serve Arachnos as elite assassins and spies. It is whispered among their murderous ranks that a Nightwidow code-named Nocturne may be the deadliest operative Arachnos has ever produced. No living soul knows any details of her history, just rumors of her ruthlessness and tales of her many victims. Some suspect that her only weakness might be her arrogant pride, but none have survived to exploit it.

Noise Tank.description: The Noise Tanks' sonic implants have made them a new kind of threat. You have to wonder where they obtained the technology.

Northern Light.description: Even the purest of light can be corrupted by Lord Winter's Power!

Nosferatu.description: Few truly appreciate the genius of Nosferatu's super soldier program, and none more so than himself. Nosferatu was so entranced by his ability to create the super strong Vampyri that he became one of them. He has since improved upon his original design by granting himself several new abilities. He can mesmerize his opponents, leaving them helpless. Some say he can even siphon off the life force of his foes.

Nullifier Essence.description: This Longbow Essence has been conjured out of the mists of the Well of the Furies, a study of an enemy made substance and brought to heel.

Numina.description: Numina was born Tammy Arcanus, daughter of Tommy Arcanus of the Midnight Squad. Tommy delved so deeply into the metaphysical that his very being was affected, and Tammy was born with magical powers. In the 1960s, Tammy and the Midnight Squad were sent into a series of caverns surrounding the Earth's molten core where a Soviet villain known as the Red Threat intended to destroy the world. To save the Earth, Tammy possessed the body of the Red Threat. Her body was destroyed but her consciousness survived, trapped within the Red Threat. During the Rikti Invasion, the Red Threat was destroyed and Tammy's astral form was at last free. She renamed herself Numina and threw herself into the war against the Rikti. In the war's aftermath, Numina uses her abilities to nurture the next generation of heroes.

Nuon.description: Anti-matter equipped his creations with the ability to generate energy and channel it into attacks. Although they appear somewhat similar to Neuron's minions and to the Clockwork of Primal Earth, they are mechanical constructs and obey only the master of radiation.

Nurse.description: This professional nurse can provide you with Inspirations.

Obelisk.description: The Psionic Resonator channels the energy of living beings into a protective force that keeps closed the gateway between the Shadowshard and Rularuu's Cathedral of Pain. It is only strong so long as Rularuu's living servants are present. If they can be defeated, the obelisk becomes vulnerable and can be destroyed. Destroying all three Psionic Resonators at roughly the same time, is the only known way to open the gateway.

Oberst Ubelmann.description: Every member of the 5th Column aspires to become one of the Raserei Ubermenschen, but few of them achieve this lofty goal. They are the spiritual and philosophical leaders of the 5th Column - totally devoted to its beliefs and goals. Like any good soldier, they lead by example. Their intense training and physical enhancements make them perfect soldiers and perfect models of behavior. In battle, they serve as an inspiration to all who fight at their side.

Observer.description: The denizens of the Shadow Shard have learned never to look a Sentry directly in the eye. By doing so, they become vulnerable to the Sentries' Paralytic Gaze, which can hold a person in place, unable to defend himself.

Ocelot.description: The most important quality that Bobcat looks for when moving one of her people to the rank of Ocelot is trustworthiness. If Bobcat cannot hold someone at their word, they will never succeed in her group. Woe to anyone who betrays her.

Octavian Mensk.description: Octavian Mensk has an immense following within the Syndicate. He is charismatic and intelligent, making him the perfect candidate to lead the Syndicate when the old leadership is dead.

Odysseus.description: Odysseus has amassed quite the collection of ancient powerful artifacts, many of which bear the mark of the Well of the Furies. The Gloves of Hephaestus are the piece de resistance in his collection, and vital to your scheme.

Officer.description: This hapless citizen is in over her head.

Ogre.description: The leaders of the Trolls have developed truly superhuman abilities. Not only do they heal fast and resist a variety of damage types, they're also capable of feats of tremendous strength. As a result, they have no need for weapons of any kind.

Olivia Darque.description: The assistant to Marshall Brass is one of the big players in Cap au Diable. Do right by her and you may be well on your way to greatness. Let Longbow defeat her and your life won't be worth much.

Olympian.description: These violent creatures appear to be manifestations of the power released from Pandora's Box. Why they have taken form themselves, rather than inhabiting a host, you cannot say.

Olympian Guard.description: These soldiers are said to be the recipients of the most advanced genetic and bio-engineering Praetoria has to offer. Only Tyrant and his Praetors are more powerful than the mighty Olympian Guard.

Omega Bomb.description: The Omega Bomb is about to explode!

Omega Wolf.description: These creatures are the bottom of the food chain in the Pack. They are humans that have been recently turned by the Pack and are not yet fully accepted. They are forced to prove themselves every day. If they are not accepted as Pack, then they are torn apart.

Omen of Bat'zul.description: These demons are the servitors of Bat'Zul, a powerful demon prince rumored to be trapped somewhere.

Omnicore.description: Omnicore possesses neither the patience nor the tolerance for anything that does not advance her quest for the perfect weapon. Very little is known about her, which is more due to her being buried in her work and not talking to others than any mysterious or controversial reasons. She has spent years of her life working to create the perfect weapon, incorporating her successes into her armor design incrementally. If you look closely, you might notice that Omnicore is the weapon herself, and her research is integrated into her body... Or, her original body is integrated into her research. It's nearly impossible to tell now.

Oni.description: An Oni is a powerful human-like demon warrior. The Oni is a formidable creature who possesses the skill of a warrior and the powers of wind and fire.

Operation Engineer.description: The Engineers of the Tac Ops cells are masters of technology. They maintain and repair all the equipment used by their comrades. In addition to these responsibilities the Engineers are known to drop turrets in the field, turning every battle with their cell into a killing field.

Operation Officer.description: These are the backbone of the military presence of the Malta Group. The Tac Ops cells are trained to operate independently and are almost never aware of each others activity. Machine guns, grenades of varying kinds and other modern weaponry are their stock in trade.

Operation Officer Quantum.description: These are the backbone of the military presence of the Malta Group. The Tac Ops cells are trained to operate independently and are almost never aware of each others activity. Machine guns, grenades of varying kinds and other modern weaponry are their stock in trade.

Operative Burch.description: Operative Burch has foolishly chosen to betray Arachnos. Show Kalinda your potential by bringing him back to her for discipline.

Operative Grillo.description: Operative Grillo is a scientist dedicated to developments in science and technology to further the cause of Arachnos. He acts as the official Arachnos liaison with Dr. Aeon in Cap au Diable through his proxies, and is involved with a number of secret Arachnos projects. He is a fervant supporter of Lord Recluse's vision - a technocratic world led by its greatest thinkers.

Operative Kirkland.description: Arachnos Operative Kirkland keeps tabs on the various villainous factions on Sharkhead Isle, making sure that no one group gains too much power or overly disrupts the day-to-day activities that keep the area functional.

Oppressor.description: Oppressors are powerful and vengeful psychics who revel in enslaving lesser minds to their own. Close proximity to an Oppressor will cause short bouts of confusion in most subjects as their mind is slowly siphoned away and replaced with that of the Oppressor's. Their rage at being contained within the Seer Network has manifested as corrupted flesh that wracks their bodies, resulting in their subsequent removal from the Network for safety reasons. Oppressors are thus without use in Praetoria, as the dangerous side-effects of prolonged exposure to the Seer network prevent them from remaining safely bound to it, and their desire to enslave the will of others makes them unfit for duty elsewhere.

Orbits of Control.description: The orbits are fonts of power. Magical tendrils link them to your base defenses, allowing those defenses to be controlled.

Orphaned Spirit.description: From their dress, these men would appear to be simple warehouse workers, spending their time carrying and organizing crates of merchandise. Their clothes are plain, and they are unarmed. And yet, they show no signs of fear in the presence of heavily-armed Arachnos soldiers, and infamous Villains of the Rogue Isles... which is hardly expected behavior, for a simple warehouse worker.

Ouroboros Portal.description: This portal will transport you to the Ouroboros Headquarters.

Outcast Charger.description: Unlike the higher ranked members of the Outcasts, these thugs' elemental powers are only beginning to manifest. Never-the-less, they are much more powerful than your typical thug.

Outcast Cooler.description: Unlike the higher ranked members of the Outcasts, these thugs' elemental powers are only beginning to manifest. Never-the-less, they are much more powerful than your typical thug.

Outcast Crusher.description: Unlike the higher ranked members of the Outcasts, these thugs' elemental powers are only beginning to manifest. Never-the-less, they are much more powerful than your typical thug.

Outcast Initiate Chopper.description: Unlike the higher ranked members of the Outcasts, these thugs seldom have elemental powers strong enough to warm their morning coffee. They're limited to hand weapons and firearms, like any other common gangster.

Outcast Initiate Slammer.description: Unlike the higher ranked members of the Outcasts, these thugs seldom have elemental powers strong enough to warm their morning coffee. They're limited to hand weapons and firearms, like any other common gangster.

Outcast Initiate Slicer.description: Unlike the higher ranked members of the Outcasts, these thugs seldom have elemental powers strong enough to warm their morning coffee. They're limited to hand weapons and firearms, like any other common gangster.

Outcast Initiate Slugger.description: Unlike the higher ranked members of the Outcasts, these thugs seldom have elemental powers strong enough to warm their morning coffee. They're limited to hand weapons and firearms, like any other common gangster.

Outcast Quantum Gunner.description: Unlike the higher ranked members of the Outcasts, these thugs seldom have elemental powers strong enough to warm their morning coffee. They're limited to hand weapons and firearms, like any other common gangster.

Outcast Torch.description: Unlike the higher ranked members of the Outcasts, these thugs' elemental powers are only beginning to manifest. Never-the-less, they are much more powerful than your typical thug.

Overcharged Carver.description: Reapers and Mortificators from the Vahzilok often find themselves without work in this post-Doctor world they live in. Many of them, hearing whispers of a new initiative being run through Cortex, Pierce, and Buzzsaw, have gladly offered their services in exchange for asylum from Paragon City. Overcharged Carvers are the torchbearers for tactical electrical technologies.

Overcharged Plasma Turret.description:
These extremely advanced defensive turrets shoot bolts of concentrated plasma at any and all non-Rikti in its firing range, a tactic the Rikti tend to favor when dealing with any unwanted intruders.

These have had their power configuration customized to be overcharged for the purpose of dealing more devastating blasts, but as a result the turret has no defensive or restorative capabilities.

Overdrive.description: Overdrive is a high-energy physics engineer who developed a combat suit to battle villains who threaten the safety of the free world.

Overseer.description: The Sentries may look like mindless monsters, but their army is organized and adept. At Firebase Zulu it is theorized that the Sentries communicate through some form of telepathy, since their leaders are able to instantly summon reinforcements when things look grim.

Overseer Essence.description: This Rularuu Essence has been conjured out of the mists of the Well of the Furies, a study of an enemy made substance and brought to heel.

P.E.A.C.E. Ballistier.description:
Blackwing Industries is a private military company which has been contracted by Paragon City to replace the police in Kallisti Wharf.

P.E.A.C.E. (Police Emergency Action & Crisis Engagement) is their heavy response division.

P.E.A.C.E. Ballistiers take to the sky wielding the proprietary 'B-PGL 82R Trebuchet', a specialized repeating grenade launcher that can field a variety of rounds designed for area denial, suppression, and pacification.

P.E.A.C.E. Breacher.description:
Blackwing Industries is a private military company which has been contracted by Paragon City to replace the police in Kallisti Wharf.

P.E.A.C.E. (Police Emergency Action & Crisis Engagement) is their heavy response division.

Breachers receive specialized training and equipment for breaking down doors and safely securing civilians from harm.

P.E.A.C.E. Commander.description:
Blackwing Industries is a private military company which has been contracted by Paragon City to replace the police in Kallisti Wharf.

P.E.A.C.E. (Police Emergency Action & Crisis Engagement) is their heavy response division.

P.E.A.C.E. Commanders are often high ranking members of the company, and receive the best training and equipment money can buy. This includes extensive hand to hand training wielding BWI's powerful kinetic gauntlets. They typically act as field generals, but can also act as temporary crisis negotiators until more specialized personnel can arrive on the scene.

P.E.A.C.E. Coordinator.description:
Blackwing Industries is a private military company which has been contracted by Paragon City to replace the police in Kallisti Wharf.

P.E.A.C.E. (Police Emergency Action & Crisis Engagement) is their heavy response division.

P.E.A.C.E. Coordinators are one of the most unassuming, but when left to their own devices, are the most dangerous type of operative. Utilizing integrated cybernetics and the Coordinator's own psionic powers, they can both process and communicate massive amounts of data directly into their squad's minds to achieve an almost inhuman level of coordination. BWI's source for this impressive technology and the supply of psychics who can utilize it are a topic of frequent debate amongst arms dealers.

P.E.A.C.E. Drone.description:
Blackwing Industries is a private military company which has been contracted by Paragon City to replace the police in Kallisti Wharf.

These P.E.A.C.E. (Police Emergency Action & Crisis Engagement) combat drones have been deployed in the zone to maintain order, and are just as dangerous as the ones utilized by the Paragon Police Department in other parts of the city. These are equipped with an emitter of BWI's patented kinetic fields, these can make BWI's personnel nearly invincible until the drone is dealt with.

P.E.A.C.E. Engineer.description:
Blackwing Industries is a private military company which has been contracted by Paragon City to replace the police in Kallisti Wharf.

P.E.A.C.E. (Police Emergency Action & Crisis Engagement) is their heavy response division.

These engineers are responsible for maintaining and deploying BWI's P.E.A.C.E Drones that grants Blackwing personnel protection via kinetic dampening force shields.

P.E.A.C.E. Heavy.description:
Blackwing Industries is a private military company which has been contracted by Paragon City to replace the police in Kallisti Wharf.

P.E.A.C.E. (Police Emergency Action & Crisis Engagement) is their heavy response division. When even the average P.E.A.C.E. Operative isnâ€™t enough, they send in the Heavy units.

Equipped with heavy kinetic armor and powerful suppressive rifles equipped with under-barrel utility launchers, these men and women are prepared to face the strongest foes.

P.E.A.C.E. Keeper.description:
Blackwing Industries is a private military company which has been contracted by Paragon City to replace the police in Kallisti Wharf.

P.E.A.C.E. (Police Emergency Action & Crisis Engagement) is their heavy response division.

The P.E.A.C.E. Keeper is BWI's ultimate display of authority, an enormous humanoid mech that has every technological bell and whistle installed. These are not a common sight, as the prohibitive cost makes widespread deployment not feasible, but when the need arises, one of Blackwing's P.E.A.C.E. Keepers can be deployed to annihilate anything that possibly threatens the peace in Kallisti Wharf.

P.E.A.C.E. Medic.description:
Blackwing Industries is a private military company which has been contracted by Paragon City to replace the police in Kallisti Wharf.

P.E.A.C.E. (Police Emergency Action & Crisis Engagement) is their heavy response division.

Clad in white and red, the Medics are the primary medical support unit for P.E.A.C.E. units. Whether friend or foe, these EMTs will always be there to tend to the injured after the action is over.

P.E.A.C.E. Neutralizer.description:
Blackwing Industries is a private military company which has been contracted by Paragon City to replace the police in Kallisti Wharf.

P.E.A.C.E. (Police Emergency Action & Crisis Engagement) is their heavy response division.

Neutralizers are designed to completely obliterate a target that has been deemed too dangerous to be taken alive, when the potential threat outweighs the cost of collateral damage. Equipped with various artillery-class weapon armaments, these are the last resort in BWI's arsenal, when a dire situation calls for discarding all restraint.

P.E.A.C.E. Operative.description:
Blackwing Industries is a private military company which has been contracted by Paragon City to replace the police in Kallisti Wharf.

P.E.A.C.E. (Police Emergency Action & Crisis Engagement) is their heavy response division.

These operatives are equipped with psionic grenades and suppressive rifles utilizing non-lethal neurotoxin bullets made of compressed ice.

P.E.A.C.E. Phantom.description:
Blackwing Industries is a private military company which has been contracted by Paragon City to replace the police in Kallisti Wharf.

P.E.A.C.E. (Police Emergency Action & Crisis Engagement) is their heavy response division.

Phantoms wield weapons coated in non-lethal neurotoxic agents, vanish using cloaking devices, and are trained in infiltration techniques. Specular implants allow them to detect hidden threats and identify targets, making it extremely difficult to take them by surprise.

P.E.A.C.E. Sentinel.description:
Blackwing Industries is a private military company which has been contracted by Paragon City to replace the police in Kallisti Wharf.

These P.E.A.C.E. (Police Emergency Action & Crisis Engagement) Sentinel-class defense drones have been deployed in the zone to maintain order, and are just as potent as the ones utilized by the Paragon Police Department in other parts of the city.

P.E.A.C.E. Vanguard.description:
Blackwing Industries is a private military company which has been contracted by Paragon City to replace the police in Kallisti Wharf.

P.E.A.C.E. (Police Emergency Action & Crisis Engagement) is their heavy response division.

Some Breachers receive further specialized training and equipment. With improved armor, repeating shotguns, and piston boots designed to kick in massive metal doors, the Vanguards are often seen at the front of any operation.

P172688555.description: This hapless citizen is in over his head.

P3454035522.description: Most Cabal Sorceresses have become quite hardened over the years. Most are utterly implacable, fixed single-mindedly on their quest to exterminate the Red Caps. Still, some Salamancans have reported seeing a look of pity in the eyes of the Sorceresses. It could be that there is some spark of humanity left in them.

PPD Assault.description: To keep up with the inhuman abilities of some villains, the PPD has engineered a powered armor unit. Trained PPD officers don servo-assisted combat armor which not only protects them, but increases their strength and reflexes. Heavy machineguns and energy weapons add impressive firepower to the mix. These awesome but costly suits are reserved for major conflicts against Paragon City's most fearsome foes.

PPD Awakened.description: Though the PPD has vowed to protect the city without seeking alliances or help from the numerous hero organizations, they have created an elite and controversial unit out of desperation in order to handle the most powerful enemies. Carefully tested and screened officers have volunteered to merge with like minded Kheldians in order to augment their powers.Their effectiveness on the field is unparalleled. Few enemies can stand up to the might of even the lesser merged, let alone a full transcended Quantum.

PPD Captain.description: The Paragon Police Department is charged with the unending duty of keeping the streets of the city safe for its citizens. These brave men and women watch over Paragon City, dedicating their lives to make it a better place.

PPD Car.description: This car looks like it's of sturdy construction.

PPD Cop.description: The Paragon Police Department is charged with the unending duty of keeping the streets of the city safe for its citizens. These brave men and women watch over Paragon City, dedicating their lives to make it a better place.

PPD Detective.description: The Paragon Police Department is charged with the unending duty of keeping the streets of the city safe for its citizens. These brave men and women watch over Paragon City, dedicating their lives to make it a better place.

PPD Drone.description: In the fight to keep the city safe there are times when it is too dangerous for a human officer to lead the way. For these high risk situations the PPD has designed three robotic automatons to keep them in the game. Each model is designed to take whatever punishment can be thrown at it and keep the pressure on with an impressive arsenal of its own.

PPD Enforcer.description: In the fight to keep the city safe there are times when it is too dangerous for a human officer to lead the way. For these high risk situations the PPD has designed three robotic automatons to keep them in the game. Each model is designed to take whatever punishment can be thrown at it and keep the pressure on with an impressive arsenal of its own.

PPD Ghost.description: Keeping the peace in Paragon City is not easy by any stretch of the imagination, and the PPD has to be clever and innovative to keep up with would be criminals. When things get dicey, PPD SWAT answers the call. These heavily armored officers have extensive training with the newest tactics and weaponry to combat their often super powered foes.

PPD Guardian.description: In the fight to keep the city safe there are times when it is too dangerous for a human officer to lead the way. For these high risk situations the PPD has designed three robotic automatons to keep them in the game. Each model is designed to take whatever punishment can be thrown at it and keep the pressure on with an impressive arsenal of its own.

PPD Hard Suit.description: To keep up with the inhuman abilities of some villains, the PPD has engineered a powered armor unit. Trained PPD officers don servo-assisted combat armor which not only protects them, but increases their strength and reflexes. Heavy machineguns and energy weapons add impressive firepower to the mix. These awesome but costly suits are reserved for major conflicts against Paragon City's most fearsome foes.

PPD Interrogator.description: The flash of a silver trenchcoat that accompanies the arrival of a PPD Investigator is enough to send a thrill of fear down the spine of any resident of Praetoria. If an Investigator has arrived at your door then you should already be planning your full-throated confession.

PPD Investigator.description: These senior officers are masters of investigation and uncovering evidence that leads to conviction after conviction. Once they are on the trail, no one is safe from their relentless pursuit. No one.

PPD Justicar.description: Justicars are promoted from the ranks of the Troopers based on their loyalty to the PPD. They've received additional training on using their Force Gauntlet in hand to hand combat. They can super charge it allowing a tremendous burst of force.

PPD Operative.description: Keeping the peace in Paragon City is not easy by any stretch of the imagination, and the PPD has to be clever and innovative to keep up with would be criminals. When things get dicey, PPD SWAT answers the call. These heavily armored officers have extensive training with the newest tactics and weaponry to combat their often super powered foes.

PPD Psi-Captain.description: It isn't always physical strength or force that triumphs in the end. By honing their minds in intensive training programs, these officers have unlocked their psionic potential, using their minds to affect the world around them. With manipulative mind control and potent telekinesis abilities they can halt even the most determined law breakers.

PPD Psi-Cop.description: It isn't always physical strength or force that triumphs in the end. By honing their minds in intensive training programs, these officers have unlocked their psionic potential, using their minds to affect the world around them. With manipulative mind control and potent telekinesis abilities they can halt even the most determined law breakers.

PPD Psi-Lieutenant.description: It isn't always physical strength or force that triumphs in the end. By honing their minds in intensive training programs, these officers have unlocked their psionic potential, using their minds to affect the world around them. With manipulative mind control and potent telekinesis abilities they can halt even the most determined law breakers.

PPD Psi-Officer.description: It isn't always physical strength or force that triumphs in the end. By honing their minds in intensive training programs, these officers have unlocked their psionic potential, using their minds to affect the world around them. With manipulative mind control and potent telekinesis abilities they can halt even the most determined law breakers.

PPD Quantum.description: Though the PPD has vowed to protect the city without seeking alliances or help from the numerous hero organizations, they have created an elite and controversial unit out of desperation in order to handle the most powerful enemies. Carefully tested and screened officers have volunteered to merge with like minded Kheldians in order to augment their powers.Their effectiveness on the field is unparalleled. Few enemies can stand up to the might of even the lesser merged, let alone a full transcended Quantum.

PPD Reinforcement.description: To keep up with the inhuman abilities of some villains, the PPD has engineered a powered armor unit. Trained PPD officers don servo-assisted combat armor which not only protects them, but increases their strength and reflexes. Heavy machineguns and energy weapons add impressive firepower to the mix. These awesome but costly suits are reserved for major conflicts against Paragon City's most fearsome foes.

PPD SWAT Van.description: This truck looks like it's of sturdy construction.

PPD Sergeant.description: The Paragon Police Department is charged with the unending duty of keeping the streets of the city safe for its citizens. These brave men and women watch over Paragon City, dedicating their lives to make it a better place.

PPD Shell.description: To keep up with the inhuman abilities of some villains, the PPD has engineered a powered armor unit. Trained PPD officers don servo-assisted combat armor which not only protects them, but increases their strength and reflexes. Heavy machineguns and energy weapons add impressive firepower to the mix. These awesome but costly suits are reserved for major conflicts against Paragon City's most fearsome foes.

PPD Suppressor.description: The Praetoria Police Department is charged with the unending duty of maintaining order on the streets of the City. These tireless men and women watch over Praetoria City, dedicating their lives to serving Emperor Cole...and the populace, of course.

PPD Transcended.description: Though the PPD has vowed to protect the city without seeking alliances or help from the numerous hero organizations, they have created an elite and controversial unit out of desperation in order to handle the most powerful enemies. Carefully tested and screened officers have volunteered to merge with like minded Kheldians in order to augment their powers.Their effectiveness on the field is unparalleled. Few enemies can stand up to the might of even the lesser merged, let alone a full transcended Quantum.

PPD Trooper.description: The Praetoria Police Department is charged with the unending duty of maintaining order on the streets of the City. These tireless men and women watch over Praetoria City, dedicating their lives to serving Emperor Cole...and the populace, of course.

PPD Undercover Cop.description: Plain clothes officer meant to look like a normal civilian. Subdued Hawaiian shirt and slacks, no PPD insignia.

PPD Unleashed.description: Though the PPD has vowed to protect the city without seeking alliances or help from the numerous hero organizations, they have created an elite and controversial unit out of desperation in order to handle the most powerful enemies. Carefully tested and screened officers have volunteered to merge with like minded Kheldians in order to augment their powers.Their effectiveness on the field is unparalleled. Few enemies can stand up to the might of even the lesser merged, let alone a full transcended Quantum.

PPD Warrant Officer.description: Warrant Officers are promoted from the ranks of the Troopers based on their loyalty to the PPD. They are often responsible for dispatching troops into dangerous situations. They understand very clearly the risk that comes with a PPD uniform.

PTS Worker.description: These hapless workers are in danger, and that's just from their normal job working for Dr. Aeon.

Paco.description: Even prisoners have their hierarchies. Some convicts rise to leadership positions because of their ruthlessness and ferocity.

Paingod.description: Where Paingod walks only suffering remains.

Painted One.description: Genetically altered to have a hyper developed medulla oblongata, Ghouls produce adrenaline at a prodigious rate, enhancing their strength, speed, and aggressiveness. Painted ones lead packs of hunters, directing their rage by showering their victims in disgusting bile which attracts nearby Ghouls.

Paladin.description: The Clockwork have outdone themselves. This Paladin of the Clockwork King must be destroyed!

Pamela.description: This civilian has been invited to hang out in your Supergroup Base.

Pandora's Box.description: This ancient artifact holds immeasurable power within.

Paragon Protector.description: Crey denies the rumors that the Paragon Protectors are corporate pawns, but no one outside the company knows the truth for sure. The Claw Pattern hero is a master of melee combat, using both claws and enhanced physical attributes to make mincemeat of his or her opponents.

Paragon Protector Elite.description: Crey has created synthetic super-humans like this one using DNA harvested from fallen heroes and villains. This clone's brain has been modified into a living weapon, capable of firing deadly psionic attacks.

Pariah Anchorite.description: The most fully mutated Lost, the Pariahs no longer bear any resemblance to the humans they once were. They've become true monsters, although it's not their claws you should fear - it's their prodigious psychic powers, which can rend an opponent's mind faster than any claw can tear flesh.

Pariah Anchorite Quantum.description: The most fully mutated Lost, the Pariahs no longer bear any resemblance to the humans they once were. They've become true monsters, although it's not their claws you should fear - it's their prodigious psychic powers, which can rend an opponent's mind faster than any claw can tear flesh.

Pariah Prelate.description: The most fully mutated Lost, the Pariahs no longer bear any resemblance to the humans they once were. They've become true monsters, although it's not their claws you should fear - it's their prodigious psychic powers, which can rend an opponent's mind faster than any claw can tear flesh.

Particle Scope.description: This strange machine looks highly advanced.

Pathogen.description: The Reapers seem to be the only normal humans among the ranks of Dr. Vahzilok's reanimated legions. They are trained surgeons who collect body parts with the help of poison darts and industrial strength hacksaws.

Patient Zero.description: When a Destroyer has shown his true dedication to the group he is put through another Gauntlet. Those who pass the test are elevated to Hombres and are given the symbolic tattoos fitting of their station. Hombres have no need of weapons as the immense strength afforded by their increased Fixodine use is more than enough to make them deadly adversaries.

Patricia.description: This civilian has been invited to hang out in your Supergroup Base.

Patrick.description: This civilian has been invited to hang out in your Supergroup Base.

Patrol Guard.description: Crey's Security Agents have become an almost ubiquitous sight in Paragon City, especially in any Crey owned facility. They're armed with standard law enforcement weapons, from riot batons to assault weapons.

Patroller.description:
Blackwing Industries is a private military company which has been contracted by Paragon City to replace the police in Kallisti Wharf.

These patrol officers are the main faces of the company to the people of the Wharf. They are chiefly responsible for patrolling the streets, but also take part in BWIâ€™s extensive community outreach and support programs.

Patroller Engineer.description:
Blackwing Industries is a private military company which has been contracted by Paragon City to replace the police in Kallisti Wharf.

These patrol officers are the main faces of the company to the people of the Wharf. They are chiefly responsible for patrolling the streets, but also take part in BWIâ€™s extensive community outreach and support programs.

Patrolman.description: In the Night Ward the Drudge Patrolmen are the embodiment of the authority and law of the Taskmaster's Office. Some souls try to resist their transition from one world to the next, while outsiders are always trafficking in stolen souls. It is the Patrolman's job to ensure that operations in Night Ward move smoothly, and take care of any complications that might arise.

Patron Power Granter.description: This machine can grant villains a portion of the power stolen from Lord Recluse's Lieutenants.

Paul.description: This civilian has been invited to hang out in your Supergroup Base.
